meanings.definition: To make a notch or notches in.
meanings.sent1: She was notching the wood to fit it together.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys notching his belt to keep track of his weight loss.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was notching the acorn with tiny teeth marks.
meanings.sent4: The artist was notching the clay with intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: Notching the arrow, he prepared to shoot the target with precision.

meanings.sent1: The notching in the tree trunk was a perfect hiding spot for insects.
meanings.sent2: She admired the notching on the ancient stone tablet.
meanings.sent3: The notching on the cake made it look like a mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The notching on the mountain was a reminder of the glacier's power.
meanings.sent5: The notching on the paper gave it a unique texture.
